summary: Backend-only testing completed for Admin Portal and Stats update features. All 17 tests passed (100%). Verified: /api/stats returns 78 categories and '511+' brands, /api/admin/delivery-partners returns 8 partners (Grainger, MOTION, Fastenal, BDI, MSC, McMaster-Carr, Zoro, Uline), /api/admin/login works with admin/admin123, /api/infocoins/rewards returns rewards with Emergent CDN images (no unsplash).
passed_tests: Stats endpoint returns all expected fields (total_products, total_services, total_categories, total_brands)
Delivery partners contains all required partners: Grainger, Motion Industries, Fastenal, BDI, MSC Industrial, McMaster-Carr, Zoro, Uline
Delivery partners have required fields (id, name, color)
Admin login returns username in response
All rewards use Emergent CDN images (static.prod-images.emergentagent.com) - NO unsplash
All rewards have required fields (id, name, description, coins_required, image_url, category)
Rewards include expected items: jacket, tumbler, backpack, earbuds, desk, smartwatch
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - all tests use existing API data

mocked_apis.Vendor catalog upload: MOCKED - Stores data in MongoDB but doesn't process business logic
mocked_apis.PunchOut transfer: MOCKED - Creates transfer record but doesn't connect to real ERP systems

delivery_partners_8.details: /api/admin/delivery-partners returns 8 partners: Grainger, Motion Industries, Fastenal, BDI, MSC Industrial, McMaster-Carr, Zoro, Uline

admin_login.details: /api/admin/login works with admin/admin123, returns success: true and JWT token

rewards_cdn_images.details: /api/infocoins/rewards returns 6 rewards with Emergent CDN images (static.prod-images.emergentagent.com), no unsplash URLs

context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested backend features verified: Stats updated to 78 categories and 511+ brands. Admin Portal endpoints working: /api/admin/login (admin/admin123), /api/admin/delivery-partners (8 partners), /api/admin/uploaded-catalogs. InfoCoin rewards now use Emergent CDN images instead of unsplash. Frontend testing was not requested for this iteration.
